meta.title: Best Dogs for New York, NY Living
meta.description: Living in NYC? Here are the best dog breeds for apartment life and city streets.

h1: Best Dogs for New York, NY
intro: NYC is a dog lover's paradise, but you need a dog that can handle noise, elevators, and small spaces.

top_breeds_for_city.name: French Bulldog
top_breeds_for_city.reason: Compact size and low energy make them perfect for apartments.

top_breeds_for_city.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel
top_breeds_for_city.reason: Gentle, quiet, and happy to people-watch from a cafe.

top_breeds_for_city.name: Golden Retriever
top_breeds_for_city.reason: Friendly enough for crowded streets, but needs a dedicated owner for exercise.

local_tips.title: Sidewalk Safety
local_tips.content: Watch out for salt in winter and hot pavement in summer. Booties are a must.

local_tips.title: Subway Rules
local_tips.content: Dogs must be in a bag to ride the subway. Plan accordingly!

quick_answers.question: What is the key takeaway?
quick_answers.answer: This is a sample quick answer for validation purposes.
